I spoke Wednesday night. The rainstorm prevented many from attending, for the windows of heaven seemed to be opened and pouring out their treasures of rain. I had much freedom in speaking from John 17:17, "Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth."--Ms. 52, 1890, pp. 3, 5 (Diary 16, pp. 406, 409).
